thread.title: H&M Q1 profit plunges: more price cuts ahead

title: H&M Q1 profit plunges: more price cuts ahead
text:
H&M Q1 profit plunges: more price cuts ahead 8:48am EDT - 00:43 
High inventories will carry price cuts into the second quarter, H&M warned on Tuesday, after the world's second largest clothing retailer reported a 61 percent plunge in first quarter profit hurt by price cutting. As Sonia Legg reports, the results sent shares down five per cent.   
High inventories will carry price cuts into the second quarter, H&M warned on Tuesday, after the world's second largest clothing retailer reported a 61 percent plunge in first quarter profit hurt by price cutting. As Sonia Legg reports, the results sent shares down five per cent.  //reut.rs/2pKNYxv
